titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Ecuador
Ecuador

div.head: Legislation
div.p: The Foreign Ministry of Ecuador is developing a system for declassification and organization of its archives. Unclassified documents are available to the public at the archives at the Foreign Ministry. Currently, classified historical documents will be available after a period of 40 years. (The Foreign Ministry was created in 1980). There is an appeal process, though requests are rare.

div.head: Location
div.p: The Foreign Ministry is located at Av. 10 de Agosto in Quito.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should write directly to the Director of the Historical Archives, specifying the subject and period of research, supported by an institutional letter.
